segment.source: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager
segment.target: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager

segment.source: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager
segment.target: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager

segment.source: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager
segment.target: How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager

segment.source: Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 includes a MED-V Workspace Packager, which the desktop administrator uses to create the MED-V workspace deployment packages that are distributed to the end users.
segment.target: Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 includes a MED-V Workspace Packager, which the desktop administrator uses to create the MED-V workspace deployment packages that are distributed to the end users.

segment.source: The packager provides step-by-step guidance on how to create MED-V workspaces and contains wizards that help in the process.
segment.target: The packager provides step-by-step guidance on how to create MED-V workspaces and contains wizards that help in the process.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Before you start to run the wizards, make sure that you have a prepared VHD ready to install.
segment.target: Before you start to run the wizards, make sure that you have a prepared VHD ready to install.

segment.source: For more information, see Prepare a MED-V Image.
segment.target: For more information, see Prepare a MED-V Image.

segment.source: This section provides step-by-step instructions for installing or repairing the MED-V Workspace Packager.
segment.target: This section provides step-by-step instructions for installing or repairing the MED-V Workspace Packager.

segment.source: To install the MED-V Workspace Packager
segment.target: To install the MED-V Workspace Packager

segment.source: Locate the MED-V installation files that you received as part of your software download.
segment.target: Locate the MED-V installation files that you received as part of your software download.

segment.source: Double-click the MED-VWorkspacePackagerSetup installation file.
segment.target: Double-click the MED-VWorkspacePackagerSetup installation file.

segment.source: The Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) Workspace Packager Setup wizard opens.
segment.target: The Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) Workspace Packager Setup wizard opens.

segment.source: Click Next to continue.
segment.target: Click Next to continue.

segment.source: Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next.
segment.target: Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next.

segment.source: Select the destination folder for installing the MED-V Workspace Packager, and then click Next.
segment.target: Select the destination folder for installing the MED-V Workspace Packager, and then click Next.

segment.source: To begin the installation, click Install.
segment.target: To begin the installation, click Install.

segment.source: After the installation is completed successfully, click Finish to close the wizard.
segment.target: After the installation is completed successfully, click Finish to close the wizard.

segment.source: To verify that the installation of the packager was successful, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization, and then click MED-V Workspace Packager.
segment.target: To verify that the installation of the packager was successful, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization, and then click MED-V Workspace Packager.

segment.source: For information about how to use the MED-V Workspace Packager, see Create a MED-V Workspace Package.
segment.target: For information about how to use the MED-V Workspace Packager, see Create a MED-V Workspace Package.

segment.source: If the packager does not open as expected, you can try to repair the installation.
segment.target: If the packager does not open as expected, you can try to repair the installation.

segment.source: To repair the MED-V Workspace Packager installation
segment.target: To repair the MED-V Workspace Packager installation

segment.source: Double-click the MED-VWorkspacePackagerSetup installation file.
segment.target: Double-click the MED-VWorkspacePackagerSetup installation file.

segment.source: The Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) Workspace Packager Setup wizard opens.
segment.target: The Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) Workspace Packager Setup wizard opens.

segment.source: Click Next to continue.
segment.target: Click Next to continue.

segment.source: To repair errors that might have occurred in the installation, click Repair.
segment.target: To repair errors that might have occurred in the installation, click Repair.

segment.source: To begin the repair process, click Repair again.
segment.target: To begin the repair process, click Repair again.

segment.source: After the repair is completed successfully, click Finish to close the wizard.
segment.target: After the repair is completed successfully, click Finish to close the wizard.

segment.source: To verify that the repair of the packager was successful, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization, and then click MED-V Workspace Packager.
segment.target: To verify that the repair of the packager was successful, click Start, click All Programs, click Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization, and then click MED-V Workspace Packager.
